metadata.Title: CVE-2023-35683 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In bindSelection of DatabaseUtils.java, there is a possible way to access files from other applications due to SQL injection. This could lead to local information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.

criterions.comment: android-platform-frameworks-base: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
